items.title: HDB Financial: Q1 soft, but multiple levers for stock upside
items.description: A stable monsoon, rising farm incomes, and the resulting increase in demand are expected to drive rural consumption and vehicle financing

items.title: Jewellery shares extend gains for a fifth session on value buying: Up to 5% surge in Senco, Titan, Kalyan
items.description: Senco Gold shares rose 4.76 percent to an intraday high of Rs 372 apiece on the NSE. The stock has gained nearly 10 percent over the past five sessions.

items.title: Nifty Realty index jumps 4% in 4 days on healthy outlook, positive Q1 pre-sales data
items.description: The Nifty Realty index rose over 1 percent for the fourth day, boosted by strong pre-sales data from top developers like Prestige, Sobha, and Macrotech. Robust launches and easing approval delays drove optimism in the sector

items.title: EMS leader Dixon Tech, on deal spree, signs JV with Signify to explore lighting business
items.description: Dixon Technologies signed a binding term sheet for a 50:50 joint venture with Signify Innovations to form Lightanium Technologies, which will conduct the lighting and accessories business.

items.title: Sterlite Tech shares gain for the second day, hits 52-week high after pact with Hygenco
items.description: Sterlite Technologies climbed to a 52-week high after tying up with Hygenco to build Maharashtra’s first green hydrogen plant for optical fibre manufacturing. The company aims to become one of the first globally to use 100% green hydrogen in production, targeting net zero by 2030.

items.title: SEBI member hints at increase in tenure of F&O contracts, raises concerns over huge volume in short-term contracts
items.description: 'Research has suggested that expiry day option trading increases market volatility and could lead to noise trading that may potentially undermine confidence in price formation,' says Ananth Narayan

items.title: Sensex down 100 pts, Nifty below 25,200 as PSU banks, IT stocks fall
items.description: The broader market remained rangebound, with the Nifty Midcap 100 slipping 0.15 percent amid mild profit booking. The Nifty Smallcap 100 was largely flat, edging down just 0.02 percent.

items.title: Union Bank, Bank of India, Canara Bank, other PSU bank stocks drop up to 2% on profit booking
items.description: The Nifty PSU Bank index has now snapped a three-day gaining streak.

items.title: Ixigo Q1FY26 – Why it should be part of the core portfolio
items.description: Besides sectoral tailwinds, the company has a strong foothold beyond metros

items.title: Sona BLW in talks to set up EV component unit in China, supply parts to BYD, reports CNBC-TV18; shares jump 7%
items.description: Talks between Sona BLW and BYD have been ongoing for the past few months now, and the local component manufacturing plant in China is part of Sona BLW's long term roadmap for collaboration with BYD, the report added.

items.title: Hitachi Energy India shares surge nearly 4% amid high volume
items.description: As of 11:47 am, Hitachi Energy India shares traded at Rs 19,235.00, with high volume, marking a 3.64% increase.

items.title: Tech Mahindra shares fall nearly 2%, among top losers on Nifty 50
items.description: With the stock trading at Rs 1,578.90, Tech Mahindra is currently among the top losers on the Nifty 50.

items.title: Torrent Pharmaceuticals shares rise 2% on Nifty Next 50
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 3,529.70, Torrent Pharmaceuticals has seen a gain of 2.03 percent in today's session.

items.title: Apar Industries shares fall 2%; stock among top losers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 8,829.50, Apar Industries has seen a decline in today's session.

items.title: Le Travenues, operator of ixigo, clocks faster-than-expected growth riding on Gen Z bookings, shares soar 14 percent
items.description: The bus and train segments at ixigo continue to gain traction, with train bookings by Gen Z travellers (aged 18-30) rising 45% YoY on the portal, and the management sounded confident of stronger growth in the flight business.

items.title: Larsen & Toubro shares decline to day's low
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 3,488.50, Larsen & Toubro reflects a marginal decrease in the morning session.

items.title: Godrej Properties shares rise 2.06% in morning trade
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 2,336.20, Godrej Properties has demonstrated a positive movement in today's session.

items.title: Balkrishna Industries shares surge 4.44% amid high volume in today's session
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 2,770.60, Balkrishna Industries has shown strong positive movement in today's session, driven by high volume and favorable investor sentiment.

items.title: Varun Beverages shares rise 2.08%; stock among top gainers on Nifty Next 50
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 490.10, Varun Beverages has demonstrated a notable increase of 2.08% at 10:48 AM in today's session, positioning it as a top performer on the Nifty Next 50 index.

items.title: Nifty Breaks Below 25,200 Amid Selling in IT Stocks| Ixigo Soars On Solid Q1| Closing Bell Live
items.description: Nifty Breaks Below 25,200; snapping 2-day gaining streak. Mid & smallcaps snap 3-day winning streak. Selling in IT & PSU banking stocks. Metals, FMCG & pharma see buying interest. Join Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota as they break down the week’s market action and highlight stocks to watch.

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Top stocks that moved the most on July 17
items.description: From Tech Mahindra to L&T Tech, here are the top stocks that moved the most on July 17

items.title: Fortis Healthcare shares rise 2.06%; among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: The company announced a final dividend of Rs 1.00 per share (10%) and the previous announcement was made on May 20, 2025

items.title: GE Vernova TD India shares jump 3.49% amid volume surge
items.description: The company's sales for the year ending March 2025 stood at Rs 4,292 Crore, marking a significant increase compared to Rs 3,167 Crore in March 2024

items.title: Larsen & Toubro shares fall 0.85% in today's session; over 17.8 lakh shares traded
items.description: With the stock's last traded price at Rs 3,473.90, Larsen & Toubro experienced a decrease of 0.85% today.

items.title: ICICI Bank Q1 Preview: Modest growth likely as margins come under pressure
items.description: ICICI Bank is expected to post modest single-digit growth in NII and profit for Q1FY26, as lower repo rates compress margins and operating costs climb. Analysts also anticipate higher provisions, though no significant deterioration in asset quality is expected

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade V-Guard, Mahindra Holidays, Prestige Estates, Zydus Wellness, Welspun Corp, Blue Star and others on July 18?
items.description: The market needs a close above short-term moving averages for an upward journey; until then, consolidation may continue. Below are some short-term trading ideas to consider.

items.title: The "technical" one-time hit behind Axis Bank's Q1 miss - management explains
items.description: Axis Bank’s June quarter earnings were dented by a one-time “technical” adjustment in the way it recognises loan slippages and upgrades. The management explained that stricter, qualitative parameters, especially on cash credit, overdraft, and one-time settlement accounts, led to higher bad loan recognition and weighed on profit

items.title: ‘Inverted C’ margin path: Axis Bank outlines how NIMs will move this cycle
items.description: Axis Bank NIMs fell 25 basis points to 3.8 percent in Q1FY26, but the management reaffirmed its confidence in maintaining margins at this level through the current rate cycle, describing the trajectory as an “inverted C.”

items.title: Axis Bank Q1 earnings hurt by higher slippages from one-time technical adjustments
items.description: Axis Bank reported a 4 percent year-on-year drop in net profit to Rs 6,034 crore for Q1FY26 as a one-time “technical impact” inflated slippages and weighed on earnings

items.title: Wealth manager 360 One WAM grows net profit by 16 percent to Rs 285 crore, AUM at Rs 6.64 lakh crore
items.description: Margins at 62% were higher QoQ but lower on YoY basis in a quarter marked by recovery in equity markets after an initial period of volatility due to Trump tariffs at the start of April 2025.

items.title: HDFC Bank Q1 Preview: NII to grow in single-digit amid slower loan growth, margins may compress
items.description: HDFC Bank is expected to post single-digit growth in net interest income and profit for Q1FY26, as slower loan growth and margin pressure offset strong deposit inflows. Analysts project a 7 percent rise in both NII and PAT
